#include <iostream>

#define s(x) scanf("%lld", &x)
#define max(x,y) (x>y)?(x):(y)
using namespace std;

int main()
{

	long long int t,k,l,i,n,j,m,sum;
	
	string a;
	cin>>a;
	k = a.length();
	
	s(t);
	
	while(t--)
	{
		s(n);
		s(m);
		
		long long int q,w;
		
		
		q =n%k;
		w = m%k;
		
		q--;
		w--;
		
		if(q<0)
			q=q+k;
		
		if(w<0)
			w = w+k;
		
		if(a[q]==a[w])
			cout <<"Yes"<<endl;
		else
			cout <<"No"<<endl;
		
	}
		return 0;
	
}
